author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Emblem And Canntab Receive Health Canada Approval For R&D Of Cannabinoid-Based Oral Sustained Release Formulation
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Emblem Corp:
* EMBLEM AND CANNTAB THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCE HEALTH CANADA APPROVAL FOR RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT OF CANNABINOID-BASED ORAL SUSTAINED RELEASE FORMULATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
